abstract: Scientists scramble to fill in the many unknowns surrounding the discovery of a lethal salmon virus in British Columbia.
snippet: Scientists scramble to fill in the many unknowns surrounding the discovery of a lethal salmon virus in British Columbia.
lead_paragraph: If anything is certain about the recent discovery of infectious salmon anemia in two wild juvenile salmon in British Columbia, it is the extent of the uncertainties. Questions range from whether its discovery will be confirmed in additional laboratory tests to whether it has spread widely to how to contain it. Filling in the unknowns is the first order of business.

headline.main: A Salmon Virus: Where Do We Go From Here?
